# PriceRadars

> Price comparison engine covering 6 countries and 50+ online stores.

## About
PriceRadars helps users find the best prices for products across multiple online retailers. We track prices from major stores like Amazon, Best Buy, MediaWorld, and many others.

## Documentation
- [API Documentation](/docs/api.md): REST API for price data
- [Full Documentation](/llms-full.txt): Complete technical documentation

## Available Countries
- Italy (IT): Amazon.it, MediaWorld, Unieuro, eBay.it, ePrice
- United Kingdom (UK): Amazon.co.uk, Currys, Argos, John Lewis, AO
- United States (US): Amazon.com, Best Buy, Walmart, Newegg, B&H
- Germany (DE): Amazon.de, MediaMarkt, Saturn, Otto, Cyberport
- France (FR): Amazon.fr, Fnac, Darty, Cdiscount, Boulanger
- Spain (ES): Amazon.es, PcComponentes, MediaMarkt, El Corte Ingl√©s

## Main Categories
- Smartphones & Mobile
- Computers & Tablets
- TV & Audio
- Home Appliances
- Gaming
- Cameras

## Quick Links
- Homepage: https://priceradars.com
- API: https://priceradars.com/api/v1
- Search: https://priceradars.com/en/uk/search?q={query}

## Contact
- Website: https://priceradars.com
- Email: api@priceradars.com
